casebody.data:
PULTE HOME CORP.
v.
INSURANCE CO., et al. No. 511P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. Robert M. Darroch, for American Southern Ins. Co. Neil A. Reimann, for Pulte Home Corp. Theodore B. Smyth, Raleigh, for Trans-America Investment.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of October 2007 by Defendant for Admission of Counsel Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of August 2008."
